mapper.select: SELECT am.allMember_type AS allMemberType, am.allMember_id AS allMemberId, am.allMember_name AS allMemberName, am.allMember_state AS allMemberState, am.allMember_phone AS allMemberPhone, am.allMember_create_date AS allMemberCreateDate FROM( SELECT '일반 회원' AS allMember_type, M.MEMBER_ID AS allMember_id, M.MEMBER_NAME AS allMember_name, M.MEMBER_STATE AS allMember_state, M.MEMBER_PHONE AS allMember_phone, M.CREATE_DATE AS allMember_create_date FROM TBL_MEMBER M UNION ALL SELECT '변호사 회원' AS allMember_type, L.LAWYER_ID AS allMember_id, L.LAWYER_NAME AS allMember_name, L.LAWYER_STATE AS allMember_state, L.LAWYER_PHONE AS allMember_phone, L.CREATE_DATE AS allMember_create_date FROM TBL_LAWYER L )am ORDER BY am.allMember_create_date DESC
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_STATE, MEMBER_PHONE, CREATE_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT LAWYER_ID, LAWYER_NAME, LAWYER_STATE, LAWYER_PHONE, CREATE_DATE FROM TBL_LAWYER ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
